title: MCLE: What Every Family Law Attorney Should Know About Retirement Benefits
desc: This class will provide the tools and resources to identify complex issues involving Qualified Domestic Relations Orders (QDROs). Learn best practices when handling cases that involve pensions to be divided, and understand the different types of retirement plans and how they should be split during dissolution. Class covers: Earn 1 hour general?MCLE credit Presented by Louise Nixon: For over 20 years, Louise Nixon?s law practice has focused on QDROs. Founder of QDRO Counsel Inc., she is a recurrent court appointed expert and a frequent speaker for family law groups and bar associations, employee benefit groups, and local to national CLE organizations. Registration fees: ?$35? Non-refundable, payment reserves spot. No legal advice: LA Law Library does not provide legal advice.
